about_the_game:
Jump into the scrum and reclaim what is rightfully yours!

FEATURES


  • Fight off ever-increasing hordes of enemies as you progress from level to level

  • Lead troops into battle with a variety of different weapons and equipment

  • Auto-shooting projectiles and satisfying melee combat

  • Earn new equipment and unlock new upgrades and go further than ever before

  • Cute, colorful hand-drawn art



  • Made with love

name: SCRUMLORDS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7+
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Fight off hordes of angry peasants and reclaim your realm in SCRUMLORDS! Lead your formation of loyal soldiers into battle in this action-roguelite, unlocking new gear and increasing your abilities as you play.
